title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a passionate Frontend Developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You will build responsive interfaces and collaborate closely with UX designers.

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and microservices. Strong experience in Node.js and MongoDB is required. Knowledge of Docker is a plus.

title: Digital Marketing Executive
description: We need a seasoned digital marketer with expertise in SEO, SEM, and Social Media strategy. You will lead campaigns and manage a small team of content creators.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create stunning user experiences for our SaaS products. Proficiency in Figma and a strong portfolio required. You will conduct user research and usability testing.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze large datasets to derive actionable business insights. Proficiency in Python, SQL and Power BI required. Experience with machine learning a plus.

title: HR Executive
description: Assist in recruitment, onboarding, and employee relations. Strong interpersonal skills and attention to detail required. MBA in HR preferred but not mandatory.

title: React Native Developer
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native. 2+ years of experience in mobile development required. Strong understanding of performance optimization.

title: Content Writer
description: Create engaging blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy. Strong command of English and creativity are must-haves. SEO knowledge is a bonus.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure and deployment automation. Expert in AWS/GCP and Kubernetes required. You will mentor junior engineers.

title: Finance Analyst
description: Lead financial planning, forecasting and budgeting activities. CA/MBA Finance with 5+ years experience required. Experience with SAP preferred.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create visual assets for branding, social media and print materials. Proficiency in Photoshop and Illustrator required. Portfolio mandatory.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy and roadmap for our flagship SaaS platform. 6+ years of product management experience required. Agile/Scrum certified preferred.
